description: Twenty one items came into the contract
full_summary:
**Open Tender Notification**

**Reference:** cb-346-87160350
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-259922/A
**Publication Date:** October 21, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

The Department of National Defence invites eligible suppliers to submit bids for the provision of vehicular equipment components. The requirement includes the delivery of various parts and accessories to 25 Canadian Forces Support Defence Centre (CFSD) Montreal, Quebec, and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta.

**Scope of Work:**
The requirement includes the provision of 20 different items, as detailed below:

* Item 1: Rotary pump (NSN: 01-5512068)
* Item 2: Headlight (NSN: 01-5479049)
* Item 3: Pneumatic vehicle tire (NSN: 21-9208468)
* Item 4: Compressor (NSN: 01-4680048)
* Item 5: Torque rod for tandem axle (NSN: 01-5537904)
* Item 6: Vehicular mirror head (NSN: 21-9201134)
* Item 7: Shock absorber (NSN: 21-9201625)
* Item 8: Exhaust muffler (NSN: 21-9200740)
* Item 9: Exhaust pipe (NSN: 21-9200765)
* Item 10: Electrical control unit (NSN: 21-9202563)
* Item 11: Drive shaft assembly (NSN: 20-0048004)
* Item 12: Parts kit for engine coolant and heater assembly (NSN: 12-1978444)
* Item 13: Retainer for packing (NSN: 01-1910529)
* Item 14: Pneumatic vehicle wheel rim (NSN: 01-4513341)
* Item 15: Pneumatic vehicle tire (NSN: 21-9208471)
* Item 16: Rearview mirror assembly (NSN: 21-9206230)
* Item 17: Radiator assembly (NSN: 01-4674759)
* Item 18: Steering column shaft assembly (NSN: 01-4669018)
* Item 19: Directional signal control (NSN: 01
